metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0223 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Unspecified vulnerability in Apache Qpid 0.30 and earlier allows remote attackers to bypass access restrictions on qpidd via unknown vectors, related to 0-10 connection handling.

criterions.comment: qpid-cpp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
